critique: The document is a simple revocation of an executive order, returning land to the control of the Governor of The Panama Canal. There is no strong emotional language or intent present. As the President, the primary emotion I want to elicit is a sense of administrative efficiency and order. The revocation itself doesn't inherently evoke strong emotions. Therefore, the scores should be low across the board. The initial scores are all 1, reflecting the lack of strong emotional signals. Upon review, this seems appropriate given the nature of the document.
